Punjab Police Constable result 2025 released at punjabpolice.gov.in: Check direct link and steps to download scorecard
The Punjab Police Constable recruitment for 2025 has reached a critical point with the release of scorecards on August 12, 2025. Candidates can now access their marks from the Computer-Based Test (CBT) via the official website. The final merit list and cut-off marks are anticipated by the end of August, determining progression to the next stages.
Punjab Police Constable result 2025 released at punjabpolice.gov.in: Check direct link and steps to download scorecard - Times of IndiaEditionININUSEnglishEnglishहिन्दीमराठीಕನ್ನಡதமிழ்বাংলাമലയാളംతెలుగుગુજરાતીWeatherSign InTOIEducationNewsHPBOSE Class 10th ResultHPBOSE Class 12th ResultExamsResultsJobsBoardsCareersBrain TeaserMedicineNEET UG ExamScholar SpotlightWeb StoriesCollegesStudy AbroadLearning with TOIBSEB Class 12 ResultBSEB Class 10 ResultMP Board 12th ResultMP Board 10th ResultUP Board 10th ResultUP Board 12th ResultRBSE Class 12 ResultRBSE Class 10 ResultWBBSE Class 10th ResultWBCHSE Class 12th ResultAP Board Class 10th ResultToday's ePaperNewsEducation NewsNewsPunjab Police Constable result 2025 released at punjabpolice.gov.in: Check direct link and steps to download scorecardTrendingH1B VisaIndian Origin Global CEONEET PG ResultICMAI CMA Toppers 2025SSC GD Constable Admit CardRRB Paramedical Staff ResultTNPSC Group 2 RegistrationCOMEDK UGET CounsellingTN TRB Teacher Exam RegistrationRRB NTPC CBT 1 ResultH1B VisaIndian Origin Global CEONEET PG ResultICMAI CMA Toppers 2025SSC GD Constable Admit CardRRB Paramedical Staff ResultTNPSC Group 2 RegistrationCOMEDK UGET CounsellingTN TRB Teacher Exam RegistrationRRB NTPC CBT 1 ResultH1B VisaIndian Origin Global CEONEET PG ResultICMAI CMA Toppers 2025SSC GD Constable Admit CardRRB Paramedical Staff ResultTNPSC Group 2 RegistrationCOMEDK UGET CounsellingTN TRB Teacher Exam RegistrationRRB NTPC CBT 1 ResultPunjab Police Constable result 2025 released at punjabpolice.gov.in: Check direct link and steps to download scorecardTOI Education /  Aug 13, 2025, 08:46 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeThe Punjab Police Constable recruitment for 2025 has reached a critical point with the release of scorecards on August 12, 2025. Candidates can now access their marks from the Computer-Based Test (CBT) via the official website. The final merit list and cut-off marks are anticipated by the end of August, determining progression to the next stages.  The Punjab Police Constable recruitment process for 2025 has reached a crucial milestone with the release of the official scorecards on August 12, 2025. This recruitment drive is one of the largest in the state, attracting thousands of candidates aspiring to serve as police constables. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) was held recently, and candidates eagerly awaited their results to understand their performance and chances of moving forward in the selection process.Only those who clear the CBT with the minimum required marks will be allowed to move forward to the next stages of the recruitment process, such as physical fitness tests, document verification, and medical examinations.How to check Punjab Police Constable result 2025To view and download the scorecard, candidates should follow these simple steps:Visit the official Punjab Police recruitment website or the direct scorecard link: Punjab Police Constable Scorecard.Log in using your Registration Number or Login ID and Password.Access your scorecard, which details subject-wise marks, total marks obtained, and other relevant information.Download and save the scorecard for future reference.Direct link here.What does the scorecard indicate?The scorecard provides candidates with their marks in the Computer-Based Test (CBT), breaking down performance by subjects and showing the total score. This helps candidates assess their standing in the exam and estimate whether they qualify for the next recruitment stages such as Physical Efficiency Test (PET), Physical Standard Test (PST), and document verification.Next steps and selection processWhile the scorecards have been released, the final results, including the merit list and cut-off marks, are expected by the end of August 2025. Candidates are advised to monitor the official website regularly for these updates. The subsequent rounds will test candidates’ physical fitness and eligibility criteria, making preparation key.TOI Education is on WhatsApp now. Follow us here.Ready to navigate global policies? Secure your overseas future. War 2 first reviews, Akshay, Bipasha-Mrunal: Top 5 news
Bollywood is buzzing with news! Early reviews are calling "War 2" a potential blockbuster, while Akshay Kumar faced a traffic violation in Jammu. Boney Kapoor remembered Sridevi on her birth anniversary, and YouTuber Armaan Malik faces legal trouble. Mrunal Thakur responded to criticism and clarified relationship rumors, keeping the entertainment world on its toes.
Top 5 entertainment news: FIRST reviews of War 2 out, Akshay Kumar's car get seized in Jammu, Mrunal Thakur's post after backlash over calling Bipasha Basu 'manly' | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodTop 5 entertainment news: FIRST reviews of War 2 out, Akshay Kumar's car get seized in Jammu, Mrunal Thakur's post after backlash over calling Bipasha Basu 'manly'TrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionTop 5 entertainment news: FIRST reviews of War 2 out, Akshay Kumar's car get seized in Jammu, Mrunal Thakur's post after backlash over calling Bipasha Basu 'manly'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Aug 13, 2025, 19:00 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeBollywood is buzzing with news! Early reviews are calling "War 2" a potential blockbuster, while Akshay Kumar faced a traffic violation in Jammu. Boney Kapoor remembered Sridevi on her birth anniversary, and YouTuber Armaan Malik faces legal trouble. Mrunal Thakur responded to criticism and clarified relationship rumors, keeping the entertainment world on its toes. Bollywood is buzzing with news! Early reviews are calling "War 2" a potential blockbuster, while Akshay Kumar faced a traffic violation in Jammu. Boney Kapoor remembered Sridevi on her birth anniversary, and YouTuber Armaan Malik faces legal trouble. Mrunal Thakur responded to criticism and clarified relationship rumors, keeping the entertainment world on its toes. Lights, camera, chaos! Today, Bollywood and beyond have been dishing out more twists than a K-drama binge. From fans calling War 2 sure-shot hit in FIRST reviews, Akshay Kumar's car getting seized in Jammu for tinted window to Mrunal Thakur dropping post after backlash over calling Bipasha Basu 'manly'; we’ve rounded up the top 5 entertainment stories you absolutely can’t scroll past. Buckle up — the drama is delicious!War 2 FIRST reviews out: Fans call it a 'sure-shot hit'Early reviews of War 2, starring Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR, and Kiara Advani, are lighting up social media ahead of its August 14 release. Critics are hailing its high-energy action and standout chemistry between the leads. Despite some criticism of the plot and visual effects, expectations for box-office success this Independence Day weekend remain strong. Hrithik Roshan flaunts sculpted physique in unfiltered 'War 2' prep workout clipAkshay's car gets seized in Jammu for tinted windowAkshay Kumar's car was seized by Jammu traffic police for violating legal restrictions on tinted windows during a routine inspection. The vehicle's darkened windows exceeded permissible limits under the Motor Vehicles Act. Authorities emphasized that traffic laws apply equally to all individuals, regardless of status. Despite the impoundment, Kumar's scheduled event proceeded as planned with alternative transportation arranged. Boney Kapoor celebrates wife Sridevi's 62nd birth anniversaryOn August 13, 2025, Boney Kapoor commemorated his late wife Sridevi’s 62nd birth anniversary with a heartfelt tribute on social media. He fondly recalled how her "few words in broken Hindi and English" deeply moved him and sparked his curiosity to know her better. Their love story began on the sets of Mr. India in 1987, where Boney went out of his way to make Sridevi feel special. Despite being married to Mona Shourie Kapoor at the time, Boney confessed his feelings to Sridevi, leading to a deep and lasting bond. Their relationship, though controversial, blossomed into a loving marriage and a family legacy.Armaan Malik and his wives summoned by courtYouTuber Armaan Malik and his two wives, Payal and Kritika, have been summoned by a Patiala district court on September 2, 2025. The summons stem from allegations of bigamy and offending religious sentiments. A petition claims Armaan has four marriages, violating the Hindu Marriage Act, and that Payal's Instagram video dressed as Hindu goddess Kali insulted religious beliefs. In response, the couple visited temples and performed penance rituals to seek forgiveness. Mrunal drops post after backlash over calling Bipasha 'manly'Mrunal Thakur recently addressed online backlash stemming from a resurfaced clip where she referred to Bipasha Basu as "manly." In response, she shared bold Instagram photos with the caption "Stop staring!" Additionally, rumors about a relationship with actor Dhanush were circulating, which she clarified, stating he is "just a good friend" and that his presence at her film's premiere was due to an invitation from Ajay Devgn. About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   Previous10 baby names that mean creativity and Bipasha breaks silence on Mrunal's viral video shading her
Mrunal Thakur faced backlash after a throwback video from her 'Kumkum Bhagya' days resurfaced, showing her seemingly shading Bipasha Basu's physique. Netizens criticized Mrunal's comments, deeming them hypocritical given her stance on body positivity. Bipasha responded with a cryptic message emphasizing the importance of strong women supporting each other and embracing physical strength.
Bipasha Basu breaks silence on Mrunal Thakur shading her and calling her 'manly with muscles' in viral video: 'Strong women lift each other up' | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodBipasha Basu breaks silence on Mrunal Thakur shading her and calling her 'manly with muscles' in viral video: 'Strong women lift each other up'TrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionBipasha Basu breaks silence on Mrunal Thakur shading her and calling her 'manly with muscles' in viral video: 'Strong women lift each other up'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 19:05 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeMrunal Thakur faced backlash after a throwback video from her 'Kumkum Bhagya' days resurfaced, showing her seemingly shading Bipasha Basu's physique. Netizens criticized Mrunal's comments, deeming them hypocritical given her stance on body positivity. Bipasha responded with a cryptic message emphasizing the importance of strong women supporting each other and embracing physical strength.  While Mrunal Thakur has been in the news for her dating rumours with Dhanush, the 'Super 30' actress has also been spoken about due to her viral video. This throwback video is from her television days when she was doing 'Kumkum Bhagya'. In this interview with her co-star Arjit Taneja where they talk about fitness. In this interview, as Arijit talks about the kind of women he likes, Mrunal tells him, "What you like manly women or what with muscles." She further tells him, "Go marry Bipasha," further adding that, "I'm much better than Bipasha." As this video went viral, netizens didn't take it well and slammed Mrunal. Bipasha has now broken silence on this viral video. While her note is cryptic, it is very obvious that this is Bipasha's reaction. The 'Dhoom 2' actress took to her Instagram stories and wrote,“Strong women lift each other up. Get those muscles beautiful ladies… we should be strong… muscles help you attain good physical and mental health forever! Bust the age old thought process that women should not look strong or be physically strong!"The internet criticised Mrunal for this video. People called Bipasha Basu an icon and added that she also has a song named after her. A user said, "When she said manly with muscles I imagined a steroided up body builder, How is bipasha manly at all?" Another one added, "2 minutes of silence for her confidence 😂😂😂" A person commented, "' i will change beauty standards ' said by a woman who herself is bodyshaming a woman..🤢🤯" As Mrunal got unanimously slammed online for talking about body positivity and then shading another woman. Meanwhile, amidst the backlash faced by Mrunal, she dropped some photos on Instagram with the caption, "Stop staring". On work front, Mrunal was last seen in 'Son Of Sardaar 2' which released recently, along with Akshay Kumar. About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Untold interfaith love story of Dev Anand and Kalpana Karthik
Bollywood icon Dev Anand's life was marked by a discreet yet profound romance with Kalpana Karthik. Their secret wedding, a stark contrast to the industry's fanfare, occurred during a lunch break on the set of 'Taxi Driver'. Kalpana, born Mona Singha, left her promising film career after marriage to embrace family life, cherishing their private bond away from public scrutiny.
Untold interfaith love story of Dev Anand and Kalpana Karthik: Bollywood’s best-kept secret | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodUntold interfaith love story of Dev Anand and Kalpana Karthik: Bollywood’s best-kept secretTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionUntold interfaith love story of Dev Anand and Kalpana Karthik: Bollywood’s best-kept secretTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 19:20 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeBollywood icon Dev Anand's life was marked by a discreet yet profound romance with Kalpana Karthik. Their secret wedding, a stark contrast to the industry's fanfare, occurred during a lunch break on the set of 'Taxi Driver'. Kalpana, born Mona Singha, left her promising film career after marriage to embrace family life, cherishing their private bond away from public scrutiny.  Bollywood icon Dev Anand's life was marked by a discreet yet profound romance with Kalpana Karthik. Their secret wedding, a stark contrast to the industry's fanfare, occurred during a lunch break on the set of 'Taxi Driver'. Kalpana, born Mona Singha, left her promising film career after marriage to embrace family life, cherishing their private bond away from public scrutiny.  In Bollywood, where love stories often unfold under the harsh glare of the spotlight, some romances are quietly nurtured in the shadows. One such tale belongs to Dev Anand and Kalpana Karthik — a union that defied religious boundaries, bloomed away from prying eyes, and remained one of the industry’s most charmingly guarded secrets. Gurdaspur to the city of dreamsDev Anand, Bollywood’s original style icon, was celebrated for his suave charm, distinctive dialogue delivery, and a trademark hairstyle that fans tried to emulate. His signature look — a black coat paired with a crisp white shirt — became so famous (and distracting) that it was once reportedly banned in courtrooms.Hailing from Gurdaspur Dev Anand earned his English degree from Lahore in 1942. Though he dreamt of pursuing higher studies, financial hardships stood in the way. In 1945, with just ₹20 in his pocket, he set out for Mumbai to chase his cinematic dreams.PollWhich of Dev Anand's films do you think is the most iconic? GuideTaxi DriverA humble startWithout a place to call his own, he shared a cramped room near the railway station with three other dreamers chasing fame. As his savings ran out, he found work at the Military Censor Office, sifting through soldiers’ letters for a monthly pay of Rs 165.About a year later, he sought help from his elder brother, Chetan Anand, already an established name in cinema. Chetan offered him small roles, leading to the superstar's debut in 1946 with Hum Ek Hain. While the film failed at the box office, his next release, Ziddi (1948), catapulted him to overnight stardom. Over his illustrious career, he starred in 112 films, delivering timeless classics like Taxi Driver (1954), CID (1956), Paying Guest (1957), Nau Do Gyarah (1957), Kala Paani (1958), Asli-Naqli (1962), Guide (1965), Jewel Thief (1967), Johny Mera Naam (1970), Tere-Mere Sapne (1971), Hare Rama Hare Krishna (1971), and Heera Panna (1973).The Suraiya chapterIn those days, life moved at a gentler rhythm, and emotions carried deep weight. The actor was deeply in love with actress Suraiya, but their romance faced staunch opposition from her family over religious differences. Suraiya chose never to marry, holding on to her enduring affection for him.While shooting Taxi Driver, he developed a fondness for his co-star Mona Singh, who later adopted the screen name Kalpana Karthik. What began as friendship soon blossomed into a quiet, enduring romance.A secret weddingDuring one lunch break on the set, the duo slipped away unnoticed. When they returned, a keen-eyed cameraman spotted a fresh ring on Dev Anand’s finger. With a knowing smile, Dev quietly requested him to keep the secret.It was later revealed that the two had secretly tied the knot. Dev Anand believed marriage was an intimate affair, not something to be turned into a public spectacle.Who was Kalpana Karthik?Kalpana Karthik, born Mona Singha into a Christian-Punjabi family, adopted her screen name when Chetan Anand cast her in Baazi (1951). Before her film debut, she had participated in the Miss Shimla contest, where she first caught Chetan Anand’s attention—they were cousins by marriage.Kalpana's brief yet memorable film career featured roles in Andhiyan (1952), Humsafar (1953), Taxi Driver (1954), House No. 44 (1955), and Nau Do Gyarah (1957). Following her marriage to Dev Anand, she stepped away from the spotlight to focus on family life. The couple had two children, Sunil Anand and Debina.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   Previous10 baby names that mean creativity and Kirron on Anupam, Sikandar's reaction to her Cancer diagnosis
Kirron Kher, after recovering from cancer diagnosed in 2020, shared her journey, highlighting her family's reactions, especially Anupam Kher's shaken state and Sikander Kher's composed approach. She emphasized that the cancer treatment was more challenging than the illness itself, citing the severe side effects of the medications and expressing reliance on faith during the difficult period.
When Kirron Kher revealed how Anupam Kher was a little shaken during her Cancer diagnosis but son Sikandar Kher was very cool | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodWhen Kirron Kher revealed how Anupam Kher was a little shaken during her Cancer diagnosis but son Sikandar Kher was very coolTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionWhen Kirron Kher revealed how Anupam Kher was a little shaken during her Cancer diagnosis but son Sikandar Kher was very coolTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 19:15 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeKirron Kher, after recovering from cancer diagnosed in 2020, shared her journey, highlighting her family's reactions, especially Anupam Kher's shaken state and Sikander Kher's composed approach. She emphasized that the cancer treatment was more challenging than the illness itself, citing the severe side effects of the medications and expressing reliance on faith during the difficult period.  Actor and politician Kirron Kher was diagnosed with Cancer in 2020 and now that she has recovered from it, she had opened up on her journey in an interview. Kirron had spoken about how her family, husband Anupam Kher and son Sikander Kher had reacted to her illness. She also opened up on her diagnosis and how the actual treatment of Cancer is more dangerous and has more side-effects. Recalling how husband Anupam Kher was completely shaken as he got to know she has Cancer, Kirron said on News18’s She Shakti event where she appeared along with Sikandar. The actor said, "It was end of 2020, I was shooting for my movie Monkey Man in Indonesia at that time. I was there for 4 months, everything is in a bubble so you are disconnected from the rest of the world. Life plays it’s cards the way it does. What do you do at that point? I think she is very strong that way, we were always there and are there for her throughout. At the end of the day, life goes on and work goes on. There’s nothing much that you can do, right?" Kirron Kher’s Rare Appearance Stuns Fans | Supports Anupam Kher at 'Tanvi The Great' PremiereKirron further added to what Sikandar said and revealed that he's never been emotional about it ever. She said, "I have never seen you being emotional about it ever. I wanted you to be a little bit but you were not." Responding to it, Sikandar joked, "Main toh bimaari ke liye darr raha tha, maa. How can it mess with you? It can’t mess with you. Galat jagah aagaye boss tum. Those conversations were between me and dad when I was in Bataam." He went on to explain his approach, saying, “The thing is, you have to be strong. You can’t be saying ‘Oh My God’ around the person, it is going to kill all the good energy around you. Nobody is feeling good about it. Unfortunately, the situation and what happened is one of the worst things that happen in the world.”Kirron acknowledged his steady demeanor, contrasting it with Anupam’s nervousness. “Anupam used to look thoda sa ghabraaya hua when he used to come into my hospital room, but Sikander was cool. Every human is scared at one point in life about anything happening to them. But when it happens, the only option you have is to accept it,” she said.Sharing more about her battle, Kirron revealed that the treatment was even more grueling than the illness itself. “You have to get the treatment done. Bimaari se zyada khatarnaak ilaaj hai iska. The medicines and their side effects. The first 6-8 months were very tough, then God was kind. You leave it to the Lord. The Lord fights for me, who are we? We are nobodies,” she expressed.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. Hrithik fans to host 'First Show of India' for War 2 at 4 AM
Hrithik Roshan's fans in Mumbai plan a special event. They will host a 4 AM screening of War 2. This is billed as the 'First Show of India'. The screening at IMAX Wadala celebrates Hrithik's 25 years in film. Fans express excitement for the early morning show. War 2 is set to release on August 14, 2025.
Hrithik Roshan fans gear up to host 'First Show of India' for War 2 at 4 AM in Mumbai: Report | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodHrithik Roshan fans gear up to host 'First Show of India' for War 2 at 4 AM in Mumbai: ReportTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionHrithik Roshan fans gear up to host 'First Show of India' for War 2 at 4 AM in Mumbai: ReportTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 19:15 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeHrithik Roshan's fans in Mumbai plan a special event. They will host a 4 AM screening of War 2. This is billed as the 'First Show of India'. The screening at IMAX Wadala celebrates Hrithik's 25 years in film. Fans express excitement for the early morning show. War 2 is set to release on August 14, 2025. Hrithik Roshan's fans in Mumbai plan a special event. They will host a 4 AM screening of War 2. This is billed as the 'First Show of India'. The screening at IMAX Wadala celebrates Hrithik's 25 years in film. Fans express excitement for the early morning show. War 2 is set to release on August 14, 2025. In a move that perfectly matches the high-octane energy of War 2, Hrithik Roshan’s fans in Mumbai are taking their celebration to an unprecedented level — by hosting a special 4 AM screening, billed as the 'First Show of India.' The early-morning extravaganza will not only mark the return of Kabir to the big screen but also honour Hrithik’s milestone 25 years in the film industry.IMAX Wadala booked for the eventAccording to a Pinkvilla report, Hrithik fans have coordinated with YRF and cinema halls to organise a special 4 AM screening of War 2 in Mumbai. The entire IMAX Wadala auditorium has been booked for the event, marking a first-of-its-kind format for the actor’s fanbase. Organisers recalled the electrifying atmosphere during War’s 2019 release and expressed excitement that this could be the first-ever show of War 2 in India, thanking YRF for their support in making it possible.Hrithik Roshan flaunts sculpted physique in unfiltered 'War 2' prep workout clipMoinnudin Rehmani told the news portal that action films featuring larger-than-life superstars are best enjoyed in the IMAX format. The special screening will take place at Miraj IMAX in Wadala, one of the largest IMAX screens in India, with a 4 AM show planned to celebrate their idol and give fans the thrill of being among the first to watch War 2.PollDo you think a 4 AM screening for a movie is a good idea?Yes, it adds excitement!No, too early for me.Fans mark Hrithik’s 25 years in cinemaKarthik Subramaniam further added that he considers the event special for multiple reasons, as it celebrates both War 2 and Hrithik Roshan’s 25 years in the film industry. Plans are underway to make the screening a unique experience, with the 4 AM timing marking a first for the fans. Another fan, Sneh Balwani, expressed excitement at simply watching Hrithik on the big screen, calling it a tradition to catch the first show of all his films — made even more remarkable this time with a 4 AM screening in Mumbai.War 2 hits theatres on August 14, 2025, and is expected to deliver strong box office results over the Independence Day weekend.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   Previous10 baby names that mean creativity and How Alka's career became unlucky for her marriage
Alka Yagnik, a prominent singer, married businessman Neeraj Kapoor in 1989. Their relationship faced challenges due to Alka's thriving career in Mumbai and Neeraj's residence in Shillong. Despite initial family objections, they married. Alka acknowledges the strain of living apart. She recognizes Neeraj's support as crucial to her success. They continue to remain married.
Alka Yagnik's career came in the way of her marriage with Neeraj Kapoor, here's how the couple maintained it, despite living in different cities all their life: 'Such a gap between us...' | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAlka Yagnik's career came in the way of her marriage with Neeraj Kapoor, here's how the couple maintained it, despite living in different cities all their life: 'Such a gap between us...'TrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionAlka Yagnik's career came in the way of her marriage with Neeraj Kapoor, here's how the couple maintained it, despite living in different cities all their life: 'Such a gap between us...'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 17:53 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeAlka Yagnik, a prominent singer, married businessman Neeraj Kapoor in 1989. Their relationship faced challenges due to Alka's thriving career in Mumbai and Neeraj's residence in Shillong. Despite initial family objections, they married. Alka acknowledges the strain of living apart. She recognizes Neeraj's support as crucial to her success. They continue to remain married.   Alka Yagnik entered the industry at a time when Lata Mangeshkar was still ruling and of course, till date, nobody has been able to reach that level. However, in the 90s, Alka carved her own niche and wooed the audience with her soulful voice. It's now been four decades since she's been a playback singer and has more than 20,000 songs to her credit. Her romantic duet songs with Udit Narayan and Kumar Sanu and some solos continue to woo the audience over the years. She created an unparalleled place for herself. But do you know that this successful career hugely came in the way of her marriage. In 1989, Alka tied the knot with businessman Neeraj Kapoor, whom she had known through family ties. “My husband Neeraj Kapoor is a businessman. He has a house in Shillong, the capital of Meghalaya. We already had family connections. Neeraj’s aunt was my mother’s classmate. I call her mausi. Neeraj is mausi’s nephew. We first met at his house. We both fell in love,” she shared in a Doordarshan interview.The biggest hurdle was that they lived in different cities. While Neeraj lived in Shillong, Alka’s music career was firmly rooted in Mumbai. Her parents initially objected, fearing the distance would strain the relationship. But the couple stood their ground. “We insisted on getting married. Seeing the insistence of both of us, the family members gave in and we got married,” she recalled.PollWhich Alka Yagnik song do you enjoy the most? Taal Se Taal Mila Dil Hai Ki Manta NahinTheir initial plan was to divide their time between Shillong and Mumbai. But fate had other ideas. “Then my career suddenly progressed so fast that it became impossible for me to go away from Mumbai for even a day,” she admitted. The separation took its toll. “My husband always says that I am lucky for your career but unlucky for mine. It was my mistake. I had promised him,” Alka said candidly.Their whirlwind romance moved quickly — they married just two months after falling in love. “We used to talk on the phone at night. When the huge bill came, my mother caught hold of it. However, it was too late by then. I had decided that I had to marry Neeraj only.”Decades later, the two remain married but have spent most of their lives apart. “We have lived in different cities all our lives. Sometimes there is such a gap between us that it takes two-four days to know and understand each other. Many times I feel that I could have spent more time with my husband,” she reflected, adding that Neeraj’s unwavering support has been a cornerstone of her success.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Coolie 1st review! Stalin calls it 'power-packed mass entertainer'
Udhayanidhi Stalin congratulated Rajinikanth on his 50th year in film and praised 'Coolie' after a preview. He lauded the film as a power-packed entertainer, anticipating global success. Stalin extended wishes to the cast and crew, including Nagarjuna, Sathyaraj, Aamir Khan, and Shruti Haasan, heightening anticipation for the film's release in over 100 countries.
'Coolie' first review! Udhayanidhi Stalin calls Lokesh Kanagaraj's directorial a "power-packed mass entertainer" and hails Rajinikanth’s 50 years in cinema | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenttamilmovies'Coolie' first review! Udhayanidhi Stalin calls Lokesh Kanagaraj's directorial a "power-packed mass entertainer" and hails Rajinikanth’s 50 years in cinemaTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office Collection'Coolie' first review! Udhayanidhi Stalin calls Lokesh Kanagaraj's directorial a "power-packed mass entertainer" and hails Rajinikanth’s 50 years in cinemaTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 17:55 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeUdhayanidhi Stalin congratulated Rajinikanth on his 50th year in film and praised 'Coolie' after a preview. He lauded the film as a power-packed entertainer, anticipating global success. Stalin extended wishes to the cast and crew, including Nagarjuna, Sathyaraj, Aamir Khan, and Shruti Haasan, heightening anticipation for the film's release in over 100 countries.  Actor, producer, and Tamil Nadu Deputy Chief Minister Udhayanidhi Stalin congratulated Superstar Rajinikanth on completing 50 remarkable years in the film industry. In a heartfelt post on X, he shared that he had the privilege of watching Rajinikanth’s much-anticipated film 'Coolie' ahead of its release and thoroughly enjoyed the power-packed mass entertainer. Udhayanidhi described the film as a treat for fans and expressed his confidence that it would win hearts across the globe.Udhayanidhi congratulates Rajinikanth, praises 'Coolie'In his congratulatory note, he extended his best wishes not only to Rajinikanth but also to the entire team behind the film. I am truly delighted to congratulate our superstar, @rajinikanth sir, on completing 50 glorious years in the film industry. Had the opportunity to get an early glimpse of his much-awaited movie #Coolie, releasing tomorrow. I thoroughly enjoyed this power-packed mass entertainer and am sure it will capture the hearts of audiences everywhere. "My heartfelt wishes for a roaring success to @rajinikanth sir, @sunpictures, #Sathyaraj sir, @Dir_Lokesh, #AamirKhan sir, @iamnagarjuna sir, @nimmaupendra sir, @anirudhofficial, #SoubinShahir, @shrutihaasan, and the entire team behind this movie," wrote Udhayanidhi Stalin to tease fans about 'Coolie.'Global hype as 'Coolie' readies for release'Coolie' is creating tremendous enthusiasm among the audience as it prepares for global release in more than 100 countries. The film stars a star-stamped actor, in which Rajinikanth played an important role with Indian cinema stalwarts like Nagarjuna, Sathyaraj, Aamir Khan, Upendra, Soubin Shahir, and Shruti Haasan. The recently released trailer has further enhanced the fan expectations, showing Rajinikanth's character helping his friend Satyaraj's character in a stressful position, despite his on-screen daughter's opposition, Shruti Haasan.NAGARJUNA UNLEASHED: Villain Role in ‘Coolie’ Was LIBERATING Like Never BeforeCensor cleared, fans celebrate Rajinikanth’s Golden JubileeWith a 2-hour and 50-minute runtime, 'Coolie' received a certificate from the censor board. Despite this, the expectation remains sky-high; fans eagerly waited for the release and celebrated Rajinikanth's Golden Jubilee in cinema through this much-awaited blockbuster.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. This superstar was almost SOLD for $250
Jackie Chan, the action movie icon, faced immense hardship early in life. His family struggled with poverty after becoming political refugees. Chan's father even considered selling him for $250. Friends intervened, preventing the sale. Chan started as a child actor and stuntman. His breakthrough came with 'The Snake in the Eagle's Shadow'. He then revolutionized action cinema.
This superstar with a networth of $557 million was almost SOLD by his parents for $250: 'We were so poor' | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmentenglishhollywoodThis superstar with a networth of $557 million was almost SOLD by his parents for $250: 'We were so poor'TrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionThis superstar with a networth of $557 million was almost SOLD by his parents for $250: 'We were so poor'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Aug 13, 2025, 17:17 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeJackie Chan, the action movie icon, faced immense hardship early in life. His family struggled with poverty after becoming political refugees. Chan's father even considered selling him for $250. Friends intervened, preventing the sale. Chan started as a child actor and stuntman. His breakthrough came with 'The Snake in the Eagle's Shadow'. He then revolutionized action cinema.  Action legend Jackie Chan may be one of the most recognisable movie stars in the world today, but his journey to fortune and global fame began in extreme hardship. The 'Rush Hour' actor, whose net worth is now estimated at over $557 million, was once going to be sold by his parents to help them overcome poverty.The actor once made the shocking revelation that his dad considered selling him to a British doctor for just $250, as "we was so poor."In a rather candid chat on Friday Night with Jonathan Ross, the superstar recalled his parents’ struggles dealing with poverty and as political refugees from the Chinese Civil War. Revealing the reason for his father's decision to 'sell him', he shared, “my parents could not afford to pay the money, my father wanted to sell me to the British doctor for 250 dollars.”However, it was all because of a friend that his fate was changed. He shared, “As soon as my father wanted to sell me, somehow my friends [said], ‘No, no, no, this is your only child, you keep it.’ My father was lucky to keep me.”Chan's struggles continued well into his childhood. At age 5, he began working as a child actor in the Hong Kong film industry and earning a minimal income with small roles. He later became a stuntman at 17 before eventually transitioning into full-fledged action roles. He eventually got his big break in 1978 with The Snake in the Eagle's Shadow, after which, he went on to redefine action cinema with his unique blend of martial arts, comedy, and death-defying stunts. Mahindra shares fire scene in OSO shot at real fire-ravaged site
Anand Mahindra revealed that Om Shanti Om's iconic fire sequence, starring Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone, was filmed at Mumbai’s Mukesh Mills, a location with a fiery past. Action director Sham Kaushal shared that the scene used real flames, making the shoot extremely stressful and dangerous for the cast and crew. The film marked Deepika Padukone’s debut.
Anand Mahindra shares little-known fact about Shah Rukh Khan-Deepika Padukone's 'Om Shanti Om': 'Fire scene shot at actual fire-ravaged site in Mumbai' | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAnand Mahindra shares little-known fact about Shah Rukh Khan-Deepika Padukone's 'Om Shanti Om': 'Fire scene shot at actual fire-ravaged site in Mumbai'TrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionAnand Mahindra shares little-known fact about Shah Rukh Khan-Deepika Padukone's 'Om Shanti Om': 'Fire scene shot at actual fire-ravaged site in Mumbai'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 18:06 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeAnand Mahindra revealed that Om Shanti Om's iconic fire sequence, starring Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone, was filmed at Mumbai’s Mukesh Mills, a location with a fiery past. Action director Sham Kaushal shared that the scene used real flames, making the shoot extremely stressful and dangerous for the cast and crew. The film marked Deepika Padukone’s debut. Anand Mahindra revealed that Om Shanti Om's iconic fire sequence, starring Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone, was filmed at Mumbai’s Mukesh Mills, a location with a fiery past. Action director Sham Kaushal shared that the scene used real flames, making the shoot extremely stressful and dangerous for the cast and crew. The film marked Deepika Padukone’s debut. Almost 17 years after Om Shanti Om lit up the big screen, a fascinating behind-the-scenes detail about its iconic fire sequence has come to light. Anand Mahindra recently revealed that the dramatic scene — where Shah Rukh Khan’s Om risks his life to save Deepika Padukone’s Shantipriya — was filmed at Mumbai’s Mukesh Mills, a location with its own fiery past and eerie reputation.Connection between film and locationAt the event, Mahindra revealed that the location held a special connection to Om Shanti Om. He noted that Shah Rukh Khan chose to film the fire sequence at Mukesh Mills, possibly inspired by its own history — the site had once been destroyed in a fire, mirroring the film’s storyline of flames and reincarnation.SRK Praises Deepika's Motherhood RoleHe also pointed out that Shah Rukh had ridden a luxury bike in his 1994 hit Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa, adding that the actor has a fondness for the brand — making the motorcycle’s launch at Mukesh Mills all the more fitting.PollHow do you feel about using real fire instead of VFX in film scenes?It's thrilling and adds realismIt's too dangerous and riskyNo VFX, only real flamesIn an earlier interview with Hindi Rush, action director Sham Kaushal revealed that no VFX was used for the scene at the time — the fire was real. The set housed SRK, Deepika, three cameramen, and about 60 crew members from his team, making it nearly 100 people inside a burning set.An extremely stressful shootHe further shared that the shoot was extremely stressful, as the fire had to be extinguished within seconds of being lit to avoid any mishap. A single mistake could have led to disaster. Kaushal admitted there were moments when he stepped aside to cry on set, feeling so overwhelmed that he feared he might suffer a heart attack.Om Shanti Om, directed by Farah Khan, released in 2007 and marked Deepika Padukone’s acting debut. Alongside Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika, the film also starred Shreyas Talpade, Arjun Rampal, and Kirron Kher in key roles.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   PreviousWhen looks can be deceptive: 10 Armaan Malik and his wives summoned by court
YouTuber Armaan Malik, along with his two wives, Payal and Kritika Malik, faces legal trouble as an Indian court summons them in response to allegations of bigamy and hurting religious sentiments. Davinder Rajput claims Armaan married four times, violating Hindu law, and Payal insulted religious beliefs by dressing as a Hindu goddess.
Youtuber Armaan Malik and his two wives Payal, Kritika summoned by Patiala district court for violating the Hindu marriage act | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodYoutuber Armaan Malik and his two wives Payal, Kritika summoned by Patiala district court for violating the Hindu marriage actTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionYoutuber Armaan Malik and his two wives Payal, Kritika summoned by Patiala district court for violating the Hindu marriage actTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 17:54 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeYouTuber Armaan Malik, along with his two wives, Payal and Kritika Malik, faces legal trouble as an Indian court summons them in response to allegations of bigamy and hurting religious sentiments. Davinder Rajput claims Armaan married four times, violating Hindu law, and Payal insulted religious beliefs by dressing as a Hindu goddess.  YouTuber and Bigg Boss OTT 3 contestant Armaan Malik, along with his two wives, Payal and Kritika Malik, is facing legal heat after a Patiala district court issued summons in two separate cases. The legal action stems from a petition filed by Davinder Rajput, who has alleged that Armaan Malik is not just married twice — but four times — in violation of the Hindu Marriage Act, which allows only one marriage at a time for practising Hindus. As per a Live Hindustan report, the court has directed all three to appear on 2 September.The petition also accuses Armaan and Payal of hurting religious sentiments. It points to a video in which Payal dressed as Hindu goddess Kali, an act the complainant claims insulted religious beliefs and is punishable under Indian law.PollDo you believe reality TV shows should include contestants with unconventional family dynamics?Yes, diversity is importantNo, it complicates the narrativeAmid the backlash, Armaan and Payal Malik made public attempts at atonement. On 22 July, they visited Patiala’s Kali Mata Temple to offer prayers and apologise. The next day, on 23 July, they went to another Kali temple in Kharar, Mohali, where Payal reportedly undertook a seven-day religious penance, which involved cleaning the temple premises and performing rituals.Their reconciliation efforts didn’t stop there. The couple later travelled to Haridwar to seek forgiveness from Acharya Mahamandaleshwar Kailashanand Giri of the Niranjani Akhara. During this period, Payal’s health reportedly worsened, leading to her hospitalisation in Mohali.Armaan Malik, whose real name is Sandeep, hails from Hisar, Haryana. Before entering the social media limelight, he worked at a private bank in Delhi. His unconventional family life came into national focus when he entered Bigg Boss OTT 3 on 21 June 2024 with both wives, a move that has kept the trio firmly in the headlines ever since.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. Alia and Deepika's post-pregnancy fitness mantra
Celebrity fitness trainer Yasmin Karachiwala shared insights on how Bollywood stars like Alia Bhatt and Deepika Padukone incorporated Pilates into their post-pregnancy fitness routines. She emphasized their commitment to mental and physical health through consistent workouts, prioritizing exercise over social engagements.
Alia Bhatt and Deepika Padukone's post-pregnancy fitness mantra: Yasmin Karachiwala claims THIS helped the actresses after pregnancy - Deets inside | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAlia Bhatt and Deepika Padukone's post-pregnancy fitness mantra: Yasmin Karachiwala claims THIS helped the actresses after pregnancy - Deets insideTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionAlia Bhatt and Deepika Padukone's post-pregnancy fitness mantra: Yasmin Karachiwala claims THIS helped the actresses after pregnancy - Deets insideTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 17:03 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeCelebrity fitness trainer Yasmin Karachiwala shared insights on how Bollywood stars like Alia Bhatt and Deepika Padukone incorporated Pilates into their post-pregnancy fitness routines. She emphasized their commitment to mental and physical health through consistent workouts, prioritizing exercise over social engagements.  Yasmin Karachiwala, the celebrity fitness trainer, recently shared her insights about how the B-town’s famed faces incorporated pilates in their training after pregnancy. The 55-year-old, who works with A-listers like Alia Bhatt and Deepika Padukone, revealed how the artists stay fit despite their busy schedules.Yasmin Karachiwala opened up about pilates and high-functional trainingIn a podcast interview with Bhavishya Sindwani, Karachiwala claimed that while the workout routine is different for all the celebrities, the common things that tie them together are their commitment and discipline. “They know how working out is very important for their mental and physical health, and I think they keep that as a priority and ensure they get their workout done each day,” she said, before adding, “Going to a party or lunch with friends doesn't eat into their workout time.”Alia Bhatt’s Ex‑PA Arrested Over ₹77 Lakh Fraud: Full BreakdownRevealing that Alia and Deepika did pilates after their pregnancies, the instructor claimed that one cannot have a body like another, but can wish to be as fit as someone else. Furthermore, she added that what sets them apart is that the celebrities, including Katrina Kaif, listen to their bodies and respect the nutrition along with the exercise, following the charts she curated for them. The three leading actresses usually include pilates and high-functional training for their workout.About the 'zero-calorie noodles' Recently, in an interview with The Hollywood Reporter, a renowned chef introduced a recipe of zero-calorie noodles, which has been a favourite of Alia and Deepika. Harsh Dixit introduced The Miracle Noodles, made from tare (the seasoning base), often soy or miso, the broth, the noodles, protein, and toppings. The chef also recalled turning up a notch for the spice level for the ‘Piku’ actress as she demanded ‘ultra hot and extra spicy.’ With the proper exercising techniques, the actresses also take a hard look at the calories they intake and the food they consume.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. 'KGF' makers DISMISS reports of Yash not being 1st choice
Hombale Films, the production house behind 'KGF,' has refuted reports suggesting Yash wasn't their initial lead choice. They clarified their long-standing partnership with Yash, emphasizing he was always envisioned as Rocky Bhai. The studio acknowledged approaching other actors for different roles but firmly stated Yash was always the first choice for the lead in 'KGF'.
'KGF' makers release official statement rubbishing reports of Yash not being first choice for film:'He will always be our Rocky Bhai' | Kannada Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamilkannadatelugumalayalambengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmentkannadamovies'KGF' makers release official statement rubbishing reports of Yash not being first choice for film:'He will always be our Rocky Bhai'TrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office Collection'KGF' makers release official statement rubbishing reports of Yash not being first choice for film:'He will always be our Rocky Bhai'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 16:56 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeHombale Films, the production house behind 'KGF,' has refuted reports suggesting Yash wasn't their initial lead choice. They clarified their long-standing partnership with Yash, emphasizing he was always envisioned as Rocky Bhai. The studio acknowledged approaching other actors for different roles but firmly stated Yash was always the first choice for the lead in 'KGF'.  Hombale Films, the production house of the Yash-starrer 'KGF' film franchise, has responded to the speculative reports suggesting that the actor was not the first choice for the film. The studio has released a statement about the same to clarify things on the matter. Here, take a look.Hombale Films reveals if Yash was the first choice for the 'KGF' film franchise: 'We have not…'In a statement to the Hindustan Times, the makers revealed that they have a "long-standing partnership" with the actor, longer than with any other star. The producers stated that Yash is part of the family. Addressing the reports online, the statement added, "'KGF' was envisioned with Yash in mind, and for us, he will always be our Rocky Bhai. We were always in touch with several other actors pan-India for different key roles in 'KGF 1.' Any reports or rumors claiming that Yash was not the first choice for KGF are incorrect."The statement concluded with the makers revealing that they had not made any such comments about the actor not being the first choice.PollWhich part of KGF did you enjoy the most?Rocky Bhai’s action scenesThe intense storyline and dramaMore about speculative reportsIn an interview with the same publication, Hombale Films' co-founder Chaluve Gowda stated that they went to a "big star" for 'KGF' years ago; the actor asked them, "Where do these Kannada films even run?" However, Gowda didn't elaborate if the star was approached for the lead role in 'KGF.'More about Yash's 'KGF'Directed by Prashanth Neel and starring Yash as Rocky Bhai, the first installment was released in 2018 and went on to become a huge hit at the box office. But the second part raked in a humongous amount at the box office. Reportedly, it earned over Rs 1250 crore worldwide. It also starred Sanjay Dutt and Raveena Tandon in key roles. The film was released in the year 2022.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Hina recreates Shantipriya look of Deepika from 'Om Shanti Om'
Hina Khan, who is known for her TV and film roles, recently recreated Deepika Padukone's iconic Shantipriya look from 'Om Shanti Om' for her reality show 'Pati Patni Aur Panga', where she appeared alongside her husband, Rocky Jaiswal, who dressed as SRK's character Om. Check out her look in the article.
Hina Khan channels her inner Shantipriya from Deepika Padukone's 'Om Shanti Om' with her husband Rocky Jaiswal as Shah Rukh Khan's character | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodHina Khan channels her inner Shantipriya from Deepika Padukone's 'Om Shanti Om' with her husband Rocky Jaiswal as Shah Rukh Khan's characterTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionHina Khan channels her inner Shantipriya from Deepika Padukone's 'Om Shanti Om' with her husband Rocky Jaiswal as Shah Rukh Khan's characterTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 17:06 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeHina Khan, who is known for her TV and film roles, recently recreated Deepika Padukone's iconic Shantipriya look from 'Om Shanti Om' for her reality show 'Pati Patni Aur Panga', where she appeared alongside her husband, Rocky Jaiswal, who dressed as SRK's character Om. Check out her look in the article.  Hina Khan, who is a known face on TV and also featured in a few movies, recently pulled off an iconic look from Deepika Padukone's film. The actress was shooting for her reality show 'Pati Patni Aur Panga', where she arrived with her husband, Rocky Jaiswal. For the same, Hina decided to go for Deepika's Shantipriya avatar from Farah Khan's 'Om Shanti Om', starring Shah Rukh Khan. On the other hand, Rocky dressed like SRK's character Om from the film.Here’s a closer look. Hina Khan’s Mom Steals Hearts With One Cute Handwritten NoteHina Khan transforms into Deepika Padukone's Shantipriya from 'Om Shanti Om'A video has surfaced on the internet, where Hina can be seen in the Shantipriya look. She wore a light pink ensemble and silver jewelry that complemented her attire. The actress exuded nothing but elegance. Hina also pinned pink roses in her hair, while Rocky was in a red checkered suit with black pants. The duo definitely pulled off their 'Om Shanti Om' avatars with grace. Check it out here.Soon, fans poured in love for the actress in the comment section of the video post.More about 'Om Shanti Om'The film marked Deepika Padukone's debut in Bollywood. The reincarnation love story received a lot of love from the masses and went on to become a hit. It was released in November 2007. The film also starred Shreyas Talpade, Kirron Kher, and Arjun Rampal.More about Hina KhanThe actress and her husband are currently part of the 'Pati Patni Aur Panga' show. It premiered on August 2, 2025. For the unversed, the actress has worked in movies like 'Hacked' (2020), 'Lines' (2020), 'Wishlist' (2020), 'Country of Blind' (2020), and 'Shinda Shinda No Papa' (2024).Meanwhile, in June last year, the actress publicly shared that she is suffering from stage-3 breast cancer. Since then, Hina Khan has been undergoing chemotherapy for the treatment.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. War 2 FIRST reviews out: Fans call it a 'sure-shot hit'
Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR, and Kiara Advani's War 2 is generating significant buzz before its August 14 release. Early reviews highlight power-packed action sequences and stellar performances, particularly praising the chemistry between Roshan and Jr NTR. The film is anticipated to deliver strong box office numbers during the Independence Day weekend, despite mixed reactions to the storyline and VFX.

Early reviews highlight power-packed action sequences and stellar performances, particularly praising the chemistry between Roshan and Jr NTR. The film is anticipated to deliver strong box office numbers during the Independence Day weekend, despite mixed reactions to the storyline and VFX. Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR, and Kiara Advani's War 2 is generating significant buzz before its August 14 release. Early reviews highlight power-packed action sequences and stellar performances, particularly praising the chemistry between Roshan and Jr NTR. The film is anticipated to deliver strong box office numbers during the Independence Day weekend, despite mixed reactions to the storyline and VFX. Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR, and Kiara Advani’s War 2 is already setting the internet abuzz ahead of its grand August 14 release. As the much-awaited action thriller gears up to clash with Rajinikanth’s Coolie this Independence Day weekend, early reviews have started pouring in — and they promise power-packed action, stellar performances, and plenty of fan-favourite moments.Mixed but exciting early reviewsOne review read, '#War2 Inside Talks: -Good Action Sequences -#HrithikRoshan carries film on his shoulder, while #JrNTR compliments -Dance face off between duo is treat to eyes -Routine Story Line -VFX is shady , esp wrt #JrNTR role -#TigerShroff will be missed -Movie for Action lovers, average for others, #Fighter > #War2 #KiaraAdvani,' another one added, 'First Review #War2 : It is a sureshot hit. It has the magical chemistry of two handsome hunks,their superb action, and an outstanding dance picturised on both of them as its major plus points.#JrNTR & #HrithikRoshan Stole the Show.'Hrithik Roshan flaunts sculpted physique in unfiltered 'War 2' prep workout clipFans rave about performances and actionOne fan wrote, 'Tarak’s intro after 15 minutes? One of his BEST entries ever no debate there! He dominates the first half completely. But here’s the twist Hrithik Roshan’s SECOND HALF performance outshines even War 1! That’s bound to raise some eyebrows! 👀💥 Action scenes? Mind-blowing. Climax? Pure goosebumps. And that emotional sequence? The real HEART of the film some say it’s what saves the whole story.'PollHow do you feel about the mixed reviews for War 2?I think it'll still be great.Mixed reviews worry me.Post-credit scenes Another fan added, '2 POST CREDIT Scenes of #War2 😮😮🚨💯 #AyanMukerji and #Adityachopra cooked 🔥😍 First post credit - #Alpha movie. Second post credit - #Pathan2 🔥🔥😮💯 JIM return to the franchise.'War 2 releases on August 14, 2025, and is expected to deliver strong box office numbers over the Independence Day weekend.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   PreviousAttractive looks of Srithika Twinkle channels her inner Madhuri but here's a twist: VIDEO
Twinkle Khanna, known for her wit, recently shared a hilarious dance video on Instagram. She attempted to recreate Madhuri Dixit's iconic 'Tamma Tamma' moves, but humorously admitted the result resembled Sanjay Dutt's style more. The post garnered funny reactions from her husband, Akshay Kumar, and other celebrities, with fans sharing their amusement and personal dance mishap stories.
Akshay Kumar says Twinkle Khanna's talent is questionable but as a wife she's priceless as the latter dances on Madhuri Dixit, Sanjay Dutt's iconic 'Tamma Tamma' - WATCH VIDEO | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAkshay Kumar says Twinkle Khanna's talent is questionable but as a wife she's priceless as the latter dances on Madhuri Dixit, Sanjay Dutt's iconic 'Tamma Tamma' - WATCH VIDEOTrendingKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionKangana RanautJohn AbrahamMrunal ThakurSaurabh SachdevaCoolieNamrata ShirodkarJanhvi KapoorBobby DeolDhadak 2 Box Office CollectionSaiyaara Box Office CollectionAkshay Kumar says Twinkle Khanna's talent is questionable but as a wife she's priceless as the latter dances on Madhuri Dixit, Sanjay Dutt's iconic 'Tamma Tamma' - WATCH VIDEOTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 13, 2025, 16:10 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeTwinkle Khanna, known for her wit, recently shared a hilarious dance video on Instagram. She attempted to recreate Madhuri Dixit's iconic 'Tamma Tamma' moves, but humorously admitted the result resembled Sanjay Dutt's style more. The post garnered funny reactions from her husband, Akshay Kumar, and other celebrities, with fans sharing their amusement and personal dance mishap stories.  Twinkle Khanna, fondly known as Mrs Funnybones, has once again showcased her signature wit and humour. Twinkle has never shied away from making fun of herself or her movies. She's often even admitted that she was not meant to be an actor but now being a writer comes so naturally to her. She has displayed her funny side again, this time with a dance video that has left the internet in splits. The actress-turned-author revealed she was trying to replicate a classic Madhuri Dixit move, but the end result, according to her, was something else entirely.In a recent Instagram post, the 51-year-old exuded her usual vibrant charm, dressed in a black full-sleeved top and loose-fitting denim pants. The actress can be seen dancing on the iconic 'Tamma Tamma' song which featured Madhuri Dixit and Sanjay Dutt. There's no denying that Madhuri is one of the best dancers in the industry. As she danced away happily to this popular number, she wrote in her caption, “Thought I was pulling off a Madhuri, but ended up looking like Sanjay Dutt." Her caption and moves made everyone laugh and how. She also added a cheeky footnote, during the pandemic, she had actually fractured her foot attempting the very same step. Wrapping up her post, she asked fans, “Whose dance style do you think you have and what’s the reality?”Her husband, Akshay Kumar, couldn’t resist chiming in, commenting, “Talent – questionable. Confidence – unshakable. Wife – priceless.” To which Twinkle playfully replied, "@akshaykumar hahahaha." Celebrities joined in on the fun too. Deepshikha Deshmukh wrote, “Wohooooo – the happy feeet,” Tahira Kashyap teased, “Killed it quite literally!” while Guneet Monga responded with laughing faces, hearts, and fire emojis.Fans flooded the comments with their own brand of humour. One remarked, “I love that confidence of counting to the beat 1 2 3 and then start. N most off all adore u for putting it on gram.” Another joked, “So proud of your ankles right now,” while someone else gushed, “Your brand of humour! A fan of it since your very first book and then all those writeups!” A delighted follower added, “This is peak Twinkle Khanna energy.”Some even shared personal anecdotes — one user wrote, “Twinkle dear I am 60 YO. I had also sprained my foot while attempting this step when this movie had come. Now I can’t stop laughing remembering about it,” and another quipped, “When someone says ‘Break a Leg’……. Delivered attempting a Madhuri step.”About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. We explore the intersections of entertainment with society, politics, and everyday life.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   PreviousAttractive looks of Srithika
